summary: Provides a high‑level client object that aggregates all Conan sub‑APIs, offering a unified programmatic interface for authenticating, searching, installing, uploading, downloading, and managing C/C++ packages and their metadata.
business_intent: Enable developers and automation tools to interact with the Conan package manager from code, facilitating package lifecycle management, CI/CD integration, and custom tooling for C/C++ dependency handling.
